name: Tile Connect & Match - Onet
description:
Welcome to our addictive, relaxing, and free-to-play Tile Connect puzzle & pair matching game!

As a classic pair matching puzzle inspired by Mahjong, Tile Connect is a popular strategy game in which you need to find the matching pairs of identical images and leave the board empty. Your goal is to connect all pairs and crush all tiles in the game field.

If you are a Tile Connect & Tile Match game lover and looking for an excellent tile puzzle to exercise your thinking and memory, you will definitely be addicted to this FREE and newest Tile Connect mind puzzle! Tile Connect - Tile Match Game is well designed to develop your logical thinking and practice your tile craft for free. This will be the perfect time killer for you!

With the simple rules to follow, what you need to do in this Tile link and matching game is to find and connect tiles with various pictures in pairs. When all tiles are matched and disappear from the puzzle board, you will be able to win the current level!

This amazing tile connect puzzle game also enables you to enjoy matching tiles and blocks with vivid and different patterns, for instance, fresh fruits, delicious desserts, and more! Come to challenge yourself with your favorite blocks in Tile Connect puzzle games!

MAJOR GAME FEATURES

- Brain-training pair matching game for all ages
- Absolutely FREE to enjoy anytime and anywhere
- Simple & fun matching game mechanics and rules
- Tons of challenging Tile Connect levels to unlock
- Clear UI and beautiful tile collections with uniquely designed graphics
- A great variety of patterns and themes to choose
- EASY & flexible to control and connect onet tiles
- Relaxing tile puzzle without time limit
- Use helpful boosters to overcome the difficulty faster

HOW TO PLAY

1. Tap on the first tile to select it and look for another one with the same image.
2. Connect two same tiles within 3 straight lines.
3. After the connection, the matching pairs of tiles will disappear from the puzzle board.
4. Match all tiles in pairs to clear the board and collect as many stars as you can!
5. Take advantage of hints when you get stuck and use shuffle to rearrange all tiles to build paths more easily.

Fond of tile connect, onet connect game, onnect pair puzzle, block elimination game, and various board game? Can you crush all tiles and blocks on the screen? Keep your mind active while enjoying, relaxing, and relieving your stress in this tile connect puzzle game, and become a Tile master! Connect all tiles with a great number of patterns as quickly as you can!

Ready to explore this new, free, and super fun Tile Connect - Tile Match Game? Link, connect, and crush! Let's find all of the matching pairs and have fun with the tile connect puzzle games NOW!
